info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Warren and northeastern Saratoga Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Glens Falls, or near Glens Falls, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Lake George Village, Fort Edward, West Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne Campground, Glens Falls North, Queensbury, South Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne, Lake George, Stony Creek, Cleverdale, Big Hollow, Beartown, French Mountain, Fourth Lake, Stony Creek Station, Oneida Corners and Paradise Beach. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 17S and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
